name: Super Conductor!
description:
Super Conductor is a 2D puzzle game where you play the role of a conductor learning how to keep the city's railways flowing efficiently. Guide trains to their destinations, manage schedules, avoid route closures, and so much more as you get the UPR System ready to roll out to the public!

Remember: Follow all UPR mandates. Deviation from established protocol is prohibited.

And don't forget to be a Super Conductor!

Note:
* Game autosaves between levels
* Requires a mouse to play
* Estimated playtime: 45 - 60 minutes
